title: Can we get rid of runes plz riot
body:
so I was terrible at all ap champs that was until I spent 6k for ap runes. now I just don't think that runes should be in this game as you need to spend so much on it just to play some champs. look at adc if you have less ad and attack speed then them they will go in for that lv 1/2 trade and win 90% of the time. and this is the same for every lane not just bot I think ether make them free you wont loss any money or get rid of them.
p.s im sorry if any words are off and that there is not much grammar as im still learning how to speak English let alone spell it thank god for atto correct.
p.s.s plz tell me what you think about this.

replies.body: h4h4 riot doing something thatll lose them $$$$ ur dreamin buddy
how will this loss them $$$$ you cant spend rp on them
ip boosts loads of people buy when lvlin new accs

Runes are a way of stopping a player from automatically playing Ranked upon hitting level 30.
They also impact gameplay in a way that makes some champions able to do more than just the suggested of them.

If you don't like them go play another game that doesn't have them.

To get rid of runes they'd have to not only change the game, but they'd have to OVERHAUL every single number in this game. This will never happen. 


I do agree that they should be free though. I've played this for 70+days ingame time and STILL haven't unlocked all champs and runes.. I have about 12 champs left and then about 50% of the runes.
lols so it would take what 2/3 weeks they have the man power or at least like I sed make them free
